articles.author: Beth Mole
articles.title: US vaccinations fall again as more parents refuse lifesaving shots for kids - Ars Technica
articles.description: US becomes more vulnerable to outbreaks at vaccination rates fall into 92 percent range.

articles.author: Neuroscience News
articles.title: New Tech Boosts Precision in Hand Neuroprostheses - Neuroscience News
articles.description: Scientists have developed a novel approach to improve neuroprostheses, making them more precise and practical for everyday tasks.
articles.content: Summary: Scientists have developed a novel approach to improve neuroprostheses, making them more precise and practical for everyday tasks. By analyzing neural signals linked to hand postures, researc… [+5872 chars]
